doc.after: JFK Airport is connected to New York City Subway and Long Island Rail Road by AirTrain JFK. It stops at all terminals, parking lots, hotel shuttle areas, car rental lots, the Jamaica LIRR station, Howard Beach - JFK Airport on the IND Rockaway Line (AÂ train), and Sutphin Boulevard - Archer Avenue - JFK Airport on the Archer Avenue Line (E J ZÂ trains). A Lower Manhattan â Jamaica/JFK Transportation Project has been proposed to connect the AirTrain to Lower Manhattan.
